member.name: P:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.AbstractServiceOptions.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the service instance

member.name: P:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.AbstractServiceOptions.Label
member.summary: Gets or sets a label describing the type of service

member.name: P:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.AbstractServiceOptions.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets the plan level at which the service is provisoned

member.name: P:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.AbstractServiceOptions.Plan
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of tags describing the service

member.name: M:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.IServiceCollectionExtensions.GetServicesInfo(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: If an instance of is found, it is returned. Otherwise a default instance is added to the collection and then returned.

member.name: M:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.IServicesInfo.GetServicesList
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all service instances for all service types
member.returns: A complete list of service instances known to the application

member.name: M:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.IServicesInfo.GetInstancesOfType(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all service instances of a given service type
member.param: String value that identifies the service type. May be platform/broker/version dependent
member.remarks: Sample values include: p-mysql, azure-mysql-5-7, p-configserver, p.configserver
member.returns: A list of service instances configured under the given type

member.name: T:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.Service
member.summary: Represents a service instance bound to an application

member.name: P:Steeltoe.Extensions.Configuration.Service.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection information and credentials for using the service
